messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

leave strange behavior wednesday november pm leave strange behavior hi guys screen shows expectation total remaining shows clarify thank software consultant registered under number whose registered old broad street kingdom provide clients each subsidiaries separate entity has liability

message.reasoning:
